textAfterTable: Game Overview Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse is a platform game developed by Sega AM7 and released on GameGear, Sega Genesis, Sega Master System. The game is getting an HD rerelease on the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, Microsoft Windows, PlayStation Vita, and Wii U.
